1370: Walramus moved to Op Havick2.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Ryccie at age 34 in 1370.
Had a son with Ryccie, Walramus, at age 34.
1371: Had a son with Ryccie, Lardies, at age 35.
1372: Had a son with Ryccie, Anselmi, at age 36.
1373: Had a son with Ryccie, Godino, at age 37.
1375: Had a son with Ryccie, Ludolphus, at age 39.
1376: Had a son with Ryccie, Ase, at age 40.
1377: Lost his wife Ryccie while she was giving birth to Margareta in 1377.
Became caretaker of Walramus, Lardies, Anselmi, Godino, Ludolphus, Ase, Margareta at age 42.
